### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_signals (
  signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_congestion (
  congestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  level INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE traffic_cameras SET status='offline' WHERE camera_id=1;
